Time to get back into Street Team mode!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: The Monster Rancher Street Team -Join Us!: Miscellaneous Q&A: Time to get back into Street Team mode!
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, November 15, 2009 - 05:29 pm:

With MR:DS coming in March, we need to start working on getting the word out so that week one sales are as good as possible.

By Zilk the Rank S Master on Sunday, November 15, 2009 - 05:35 pm:

I'm telling all my friends about the games and a few want to try ranching.

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, November 15, 2009 - 07:54 pm:

Cool!

It's fairly important to pre-order the game when you can. Game stores base their overall orders on pre-orders and we need to make certain that sizable orders get placed for this game.

By GM on Monday, November 16, 2009 - 04:28 am:

I'm planning another giveaway at my local games community to spark interest in MRDS. After the previous giveaways, everyone who didn't win ended up buying the games themselves so they can join in the discussion.

I also hope to start the Dingus Rancher project as soon as the artist is sorted, hopefully before springtime.
